title: My Grandmother Has 24 Hours to Live
description:
Mary Kate is apprehensive about saying good-bye to her grandmother during her last hours on hospice. - Dr. Laura: "Being thanked for beautiful memories and told you are loved is an incredible gift."

Have you found it too tough to say goodbye? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. 

Find me on social media at:

Facebook.com/DrLaura

Instagram.com/DrLauraProgram

YouTube.com/DrLaura
